sourceDesc.p: M.R. James, Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of Corpus Christi College, Cambridge 1912

projectDesc.p: The James Catalogue was digitized then marked up following the TEI P5 Guidelines. The customized model was provided by Giuliano Di Bacco, stored in an ODD file (parkerweb.xml): the latter was written by GDB using ROMA vers. 2.x, with manual adaptations. The ODD file is used as a source to compile the actual schema used to validate the xml: it is advisable to compile it in RelaxNG sintax (parkerweb.rnc) through ROMA.

msDesc.head: Sermons. John Waldeby OESA, Homilies. Tables
Sermones. Ioh. Waldeby, etc.
msDesc.p: Vellum, 230 155 9 x 6, ff. 4 + 49 + 232 + 3, two main volumes of cent. xiii early and cent. xv.

Volume I: A good small hand of cent. xiii early, 37 lines to a page.
Volume II: Double columns of 29 lines. Cent. xii-xiii, a larger hand, very clear and good.
Volume III: Double columns of 38 etc. lines. Cent. xv, in an ugly current hand.
Collation: 4 flyleaves, I8-IV8 V4 (wants 4) | VI8 VII8 || a8-q8 A8-N8, 3 flyleaves.

2 fo.:
Volume I: ab eis.
Volume III: pericli pro qua.
Late notes on f. iv and list of contents on f. ivv

head.title: Synodal Statutes of Eudes de Sully, Bishop of Paris
Prohibitiones et precepta ad observandum in synodo sacerdotibus data a venerabili G. Parisiensi episcopo

msItem.rubric: In nomine Sancti trinitatis. Incipiunt prohibitiones et precepta ad obseruandum in Sinodo sacerdotibus data a venerabili G. parisiensi Episcopo
msItem.incipit: Districte precipitur sacerdotibus ut ieiuni intrent Sinodum
msItem.explicit: Nullus faciat iusiurandum patronis antequam fuerit episcopo presentatus
msItem.ab: A not much later hand adds five other clauses

msItem.head: Geoffrey Babio du Louroux, Sermons
msItem.ab: Sermons, a part of the collection which occurs in MS 320. It is by Geoffrey (called by older writers Peter) Babion. The complete collection begins Dicite pusillanimes. See St John's College, K. 23.The greater part of it is printed among the works of Hildebert by Beaugendre. See a full account by Hauréau in Notices et Extraits XXXI 2, pp. 126-141
msItem.incipit: Maria soror moysi peccauit murmurando
Nolite diligere mundum
Excutere de puluere
Noli emulari
Dicite filie syon
Dominus noster Ihesus Christus ut sanctificaret per sanguinem
Scitote fratres karissimi quia uetus homo uester
Ecce odor filii mei
Dominus noster Ihesus Christus in qua nocte tradebatur
Estote imitatores dei
Cum intinxisset dominus Ihesus panem
Sciens Ihesus quia uenit hora
Venite filii audite me
msItem.ab: Thirteen more sermons follow. The last two are on
msItem.incipit: Homo quidam peregre proficiscens
Oportet dilectissimi ut sacramentorum christi quibus purificati et sanctificati estis
msItem.explicit: dominus tetigit aures surdi et muti

msItem.head: Alcuin, De uirtutibus et uitiis (chapters 6-36)
msItem.incipit: Saluator ad patrem rediens quasi speciale munus
Precipuum est misericordie
Hec tibi dulcissime fili wido
msItem.ab: At top of 48r is an erasure of six short lines which seem irrecoverable
Below: Sancti spiritus assit nobis gratia

lg.l: Vita beata deus mortem gustauit ad horam
Aspice qui transis quia tu michi causa doloris
Nescio quid pro te maius possum dare quam me
Flet genetrix natum dilectus plorat amicum
Fili. quid mater. deus es. sum. cur ita pendes
Ne genus humanum uadat ad interitum
Ligno primus adam periit lignoque secundus
Ne pereat mundus est crucifixus adam

msItem.ab: In two columns: another hand. A short extract or sermon on Rahab
msItem.incipit: Iosue ducens populum israel in terram

msItem.head: John Waldeby OESA, Homilies on the Lord's Prayer or Itinerarium salutis

head.title: Itinerarium salutis fratris Iohannis Waldeby super orationem dominicam.

msItem.incipit: Sepcies in die laudem dixi tibi
Pater noster, etc. hec epistola est supplicatoria
msItem.explicit: a peccatis nostris in sanguine suo. Ipso gloria et imperium in secula seculorum. Amen
msItem.rubric: Explicit itinerarium salutis fratris Johannis Waldeberi super orationem dominicam

msItem.head: John Waldeby OESA, Homilies on Ave Maria or Salutatio angelica

head.title: Quinque homeliae super quinque verba salutationis angelicae per fratrem Iohannem Waldeby

msItem.incipit: Uas eleccionis paulus doctor gentium
msItem.explicit: saluatoris ad laudis preconium cui cum sua prole benedicta sit honor et gloria in secula seculorum. Amen
msItem.rubric: Expliciunt quinque omelie super quinque uerba salutacionis angelice secundum fratrem Johannem Waldebi

msItem.head: John Waldeby OESA, Homilies on the Apostles' Creed
msItem.incipit: Uenerabili in Christo ... Thome ... abbati de Sancto Albano
Credo adiuua incredulitatem meam. mihi quidem karissimi consideranti
msItem.explicit: auctor fidei nostre Ihesus Christus cui sit omnis honor et virtus. Amen
msItem.rubric: Expliciunt sermones Waldebi super orationem dominicam salutacionem angelicam et simbolum apostolorum. deo gracias

msItem.head: Edmund of Abingdon, Speculum ecclesiae (excerpt of Latin version)

head.title: Speculum Sancti Edmundi scriptum per eundem

msItem.incipit: In nomine domini nostri Ihesu Christi amen. Iste liber est qui docet uiuere perfecte
msItem.explicit: ab origine mundi per eum qui uiuit et regnat deus in secula seculorum. Amen
msItem.rubric: Explicit speculum Sancti Edmundi scriptum per manus magistri Johannis Well

msItem.head: pseudo-Augustine, De visitatione infirmorum

head.title: Liber Sancti Augustini Hipponensis episcopi de visitatione infirmorum ad nepotem suum

msItem.incipit: Uisitacionis gratia nepoti meo

msItem.head: pseudo-Augustine, De cura pro mortuis gerenda

head.title: Idem de cura gerenda pro mortuis

msItem.incipit: Diu sanctitati tue

msItem.head: John Deverose, Vtrum imagines sint adorandae
msItem.incipit: Dic quod adoracio ymaginum est licita et meritoria
msItem.explicit: menti possunt dici inimici crucis et passionis Christi

msItem.head: John Deverose, De materia peregrinationis
msItem.incipit: In materia peregrinacionis dico quod licitum est hominibus peregrinari ad reliquias sanctorum

head.title: Tabula alphabetica in bibliam, sive loci communes ex Sacris Scripturis ordine alphabetico

msItem.incipit: Abstinenciam precepit deus ade quod ex omni ligno, etc.
msItem.explicit: Johannes apostolus prohibuit quendam eicientem demonia in nomine etc.

msItem.incipit: Accidia. nota accidiosus est sicut canis famelicus
msItem.explicit: ubi nos eleuare dignetur qui est benedictus in secula seculorum. Amen
msItem.ab: Another table: Aduentus Christi to Ydolatria

head.title: Tabula super evangelia ad videndum ubi evangelistae idem dicunt, et ubi quilibet singula

msItem.rubric: Incipit tabula super euuangelia ad videndum ubi plures euangeliste idem dicant et ubi quilibet singula ut patet in canone tabule
msItem.incipit: Quidam doctores antiqui circa euangelia studiosi quorum primus fuit ammonius alexandrinus
msItem.ab: The table begins on 230r and ends 231v on Matthew xxvi. The remaining leaves are blank
